channel.title: idyl
channel.description: idyl | Fine diamond jewelry for everyday wear. Modular jewelry collection: Mix & match your diamonds. Fueled by transparency: Sustainable lab-grown diamonds & Conflict-free Solid gold. Free shipping & returns.

item.g:title: Ada - Yellow Gold
item.g:description: Ada is a halo of the sparkliest lab grown diamonds, encircling an even bigger 0.15 cts stone for big timeless glow. Ada is the perfect match for the Amelia earrings.

item.g:description: Ada is a halo of the sparkliest lab grown diamonds, encircling an even bigger 0.15 cts stone for big timeless glow. Ada is the perfect match for the Amelia earrings.

item.g:title: Adele - Yellow Gold / Left
item.g:description: Adele features three graduating bezel-set oval diamonds (0.05ct, 0.10ct, and 0.15ct) totaling 0.30TCW that dance gracefully on delicate chains suspended from a curved gold bar. Perfect for those who love movement and exceptional sparkle. Style with the Elise necklace for effortless layering.

item.g:title: Amara - Yellow Gold
item.g:description: Amara captivates with three coveted diamond cuts: a 0.15ct marquise, 0.20ct emerald, and 0.15ct pear. Beautifully slanted and bezel-set for that perfect 70's-inspired edge. This exceptional piece elevates any look and draws every eye. Stunning when paired with Tali.

item.g:title: Amara - White Gold
item.g:description: Amara captivates with three coveted diamond cuts: a 0.15ct marquise, 0.20ct emerald, and 0.15ct pear. Beautifully slanted and bezel-set for that perfect 70's-inspired edge. This exceptional piece elevates any look and draws every eye. Stunning when paired with Tali.

item.g:title: Amelia - Yellow Gold
item.g:description: Amelia is a timelessly elegant diamond halo earring, set in 14k gold. Sparkly lab grown diamonds that circle all the way around your modular stud ensure a classic look that will never go out of style.

item.g:title: Amelia - White Gold
item.g:description: Amelia is a timelessly elegant diamond halo earring, set in 14k gold. Sparkly lab grown diamonds that circle all the way around your modular stud ensure a classic look that will never go out of style.

item.g:title: Amelia - Rose Gold

item.g:title: Ami - Yellow Gold
item.g:description: Named for friendship, this elegant 0.50ct Oval-cut Diamond suspends a delicate 0.15ct Pear, creating effortless movement. Classic pairing that transforms your hoop into something deeply personal. The rhythm of shapes feels as natural as conversation. Each diamond is hand-selected from the finest 1% of Lab-Grown Diamonds and lovingly handcrafted at the idyl atelier. Set in beautiful Georgian style cut-down settings in 14K Solid Gold — a quality you can feel in every facet and finish.

item.g:title: Ami - White Gold

item.g:title: Anaïs - Yellow Gold
item.g:description: Anais features a perfectly cut 0.30ct oval diamond set in fine prongs for maximum sparkle. This elegant piece is perfect for those seeking a minimal yet sophisticated look. Wear Anais solo for understated elegance or layer with the Elise necklace for a complete oval diamond ensemble.

item.g:title: Anaïs - White Gold
item.g:description: Anais features a perfectly cut 0.30ct oval diamond set in fine prongs for maximum sparkle. This elegant piece is perfect for those seeking a minimal yet sophisticated look. item.g:title: Apollo - Yellow Gold
item.g:description: Apollo is our best selling 14k gold chain earring that can be worn in many different ways. The 6 cm chain features 2 lab grown diamonds for an extra touch of sparkle. Apollo can be connected with 2 diamond studs or worn in one. Its versatility and playfulness is what makes it a fan favorite.

item.g:title: Apollo - White Gold
item.g:description: Apollo is our best selling 14k gold chain earring that can be worn in many different ways. The 6 cm chain features 2 lab grown diamonds for an extra touch of sparkle. item.g:title: Aria - Yellow Gold
item.g:description: Aria is part of our 2-in-1 family and can be worn both as earring and necklace. Five graduated diamonds float along a delicate 75mm chain. A sleek lariat with just the right sparkle, designed to move with you.

item.g:title: Aria - White Gold
item.g:description: Aria is part of our 2-in-1 family and can be worn both as earring and necklace. Five graduated diamonds float along a delicate 75mm chain. A sleek lariat with just the right sparkle, designed to move with you.

item.g:title: Arte - Yellow Gold / Select your size
item.g:description: Arte showcases a spectacular 0.30ct marquise diamond, radiating in all its shimmering glory. With a minimalist design that maximizes shine, this ring is perfect for those who appreciate understated elegance. Whether worn solo for a sleek, sophisticated vibe or stacked with rings in various gold hues for a playful and daring look, Arte effortlessly adapts to any occasion. Her captivating brilliance makes her a must-have piece that can be enjoyed daily.

item.g:title: Cosmos Ear Cuff (Emerald) - Yellow Gold
item.g:description: The Cosmos Cuff, made of a secure solid gold 1.8mm pavé band, surprises with a floating diamond that emerges from behind the ear. Wear it on the left for a 0.15ct floating diamond at the top, or on the right for a diamond that floats from below. Choose the exceptional pear, sleek emerald, or elegant marquise to adorn your ear. With an internal diameter of 10mm, this piece fits perfectly on every ear. Perfect for those looking to stack, without getting an extra piercing.

item.g:title: Gaia - Yellow Gold / Select your size
item.g:description: Gaia showcases a stunning 0.25ct prong-set pear-shaped diamond alongside a 0.30ct prong-set emerald diamond, creating a beautiful dynamic pair. The slightly diagonal alignment adds a modern edge to her classic brilliance, making Gaia the perfect statement piece. Whether worn with Rhea for a bolder look or paired with Le Couple for a more harmonious vibe. We'd love to wear her daily, as her elegance effortlessly elevates any outfit.

item.g:title: L'Éternité - Yellow Gold
item.g:description: L'Éternité is composed of one 0.30ct, two 0.20ct, and two 0.10ct round bezel set beauties sitting in a dreamy croissant shape. Inspired by our best-selling and all time favorite Lena, L'Éternité carries an extra punch. These 5 glowy diamonds can be worn casually with an everyday look but they also hold the power to be worn as the center piece of your evening look, making this piece one of the most versatile in the collection. You can wear it on its own or paired with La Lune.

item.g:title: Solar Cuff - Yellow Gold / Left
item.g:description: The Solar Cuff is the perfect hack for anyone with one piercing who likes the look of having multiple. Attach one end of the Solar Cuff to your piercing and slide the golden cuff (that has a diameter of 10mm) over your ear.This glorious piece stuns with a string of 10 bright diamonds - 0.05ct each, and a total length of 57.5mm. Wear with a simple look to really make this piece pop.
